Sub Menu

* [Council President](https://www.edisonnj.org/departments/council/joseph_coyle.php)
* [Council Vice President](https://www.edisonnj.org/departments/council/robert_kentos1.php)

The Edison Township Council is the legislative branch of this local government. It is comprised of seven members. All of the members are elected to at-large seats with four-year terms. The terms are staggered. Three council seats are up of election in a given year and then the remaining four seats are up for election two years later.
Council meetings can be viewed Live on Edison TV's YouTube page. (
Edison TV - YouTube
)
Council meetings are shown on Channel 15 on Optimum and Channel 45 on Verizon FIOS.
